I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "You Can Count on Me" reminds me of that French film because of its unexpected end.
Considered one of the best films of this year, "You Can Count on Me" was announced as the No 11th choice with 21 votes (mostly Academy members) and deserves all the praise
